1511.content:
"Ojou-sama, this is the third time today!" Ran cried out again whilst she went about disposing of the soaked clothes her misstress had been wearing. Yukari on the other, laying naked under her covers, dismissed her with a yawn. She had lived long enough that she didn't care whether she was dry or wet in her sleep anymore. This caused a vein to pop out on the shikigami's head.

" That's it, no more wet sheets!" Ran muttered as she approached her misstress.

" Ah, that's nice-" Yukari paused to yawn"-what are you planning t- h-hey, stop that!" Yukari began to plead as she was pulled over the ticked fox's knee. Yukari may have never recieved an actual spanking, but Chen certainly had quite a few in her presence.

" No, you may as well be an infant. Wetting yourself, totally reliant upon mommy Ran." Ran groaned angrily, unleashing her rage on Yukari's hide. Yukari flinched up and began to sob as her bottom turned deeper shades of red. Yukari then decided that spankings were worse than danmaku. Ran didn't let up until the door to Yukari's room slid open, giving Chen a good view of Yukari's humiloated expression and torched bottom.

"You're just in time! Ran-shama was just helping out Yukari-sama to make her finally look a lot younger than she is!" Yukari glared at her subordinate, helpless to defend herself as she was stripped naked, not wanting to hurt her shikigami.

" Since Chen's such a good kitty, she can decide what she'll wear out of Ran's magical bag!" Chen grinned from ear to ear, shuffling through Ran's diaper bag with her bloomers in the air.

1521.content:
"Good morning sensei~" The lunarian greeted her fellow caretaker at the nursery, walking inside in jeans and a soft pink shirt, tying a frilly apron around her waist. Keine smiled in return, dressed in a similar manner.

"Good morning Eirin. We've already got some children to take care of!" Eirin's eyes lit up, money signs evident."Really!?"

"Yes but, they're not quite what we were expecting." Keine's voice faultered a little as she opened the doors into the large daycare.
1521.title: Keine/Eirin's nursery school!

15212.content:
Eirin looked at her co-worker with intrigue on her face, following her to one of the group cribs. Inside there was a girl with a curvy figure and long green hair, fast asleep and hugging her blonde ancestor.
"My, you weren't expecting this? I thought that's why you wanted such big equipment!" Eirin whispered to her partner, taking note of the other occupied cribs in the room. Keine just faintly blushed, giving a nod in response.
"So, care to tell me why they aren't in the uniform?" Without waiting for an answer Eirin bent over into the crib, curiously lifting first suwako's skirt. Underneath was a pair of training panties. The nurse sighed, lifting Sanae's next. She was even worse, a pair of white lacy underpants underneath. "Keine they're not even diapered! Am I going to have to spank YOU for not following the rules!?" She quickly shook her head, covering her bottom.

"Now hold on, the miko just dropped us off like this!"A rather peeved adult's voice came from the next crib. Eirin looked over to look, busting out in laughter at what she saw. Kanako was sitting in the crib with her legs crossed, her face bright red and wearing a large diaper unlike her companions, her normal shirt now torn on her torso.
"S-stop that! This wasn't my choice! Let me out!" The goddess demanded, shaking the bars angrily as Eirin's laughing fit continued.
"I..I'm s-sorry..pft.. but you aren't a-allowed to leave until your caretaker comes for you.. w-who happens..pft.. t-to be Reimu!" Eirin bust out in laughter again, making Kanako even angrier.

Yuuka was meanwhile keeping an eye on the other two. She took a big gasp as a puddle formed under the two of them. Suwako opened her eyes lazily, yawning. "W-what's going on, did I sleep in a pond again?"
"E-eirin, I may need some help."

1542.content:
"What the hell is going on here?" Yuuka Kazami demanded to know, siiting on a certain grinning blonde youkai's lap, her clothes torn to shreds and her hands cuffed together, likewise with her feet.
"Oh, I heard that there was a flower youkai going around who was a threat to my power if I let her keep growing, so I fixed that." Yukari explained, a hint of sarcasm dripping from her voice as she rocked back in forth in her rocking chair, stroking Yuuka's head.
Yuuka grunted in response, trying to rip the cuffs off with sheer force.
"Oh, that won't work silly." Yukari said, grinning at the confused look on the youkai's face.
"Those are just normal steel, so you'd be able to break them normally, right?" Yuuka gave a meek nod in response, trying to understand what this gap hag was getting at. "Well that won't work, because I made the gap between you and me in terms of power several hundred times larger. Well, to be exact, I switched the positions in the gap of power between you and the ice fairy, then made THAT many times larger." Yukari looked on with a grin as Yuuka stared at her disbelief.
"There's no way I could be the weakest in all of Gensokyo!" Yuuka screamed, starting to tear up as she continued to struggle with her restraints. Yukari watched for a couple minutes as the once powerful flower youkai struggled withher restraints, growing tired and red in the face quickly."No...way..."
"That's only half of your punishment though. Now I'll teach you what you are when compared to someone like me, an overgrown baby." Yukari got up with Yuuka in her arms, laying her down on a padded table with several cubbys underneath. Only now did Yuuka realize that she was in a nursery with soft green walls and all the furnishings that a regular nursery would have, except everything was in a size that could fit her or even Yukari.
"Y...you can't b-" Before Yuuka could finish her sentence Yukari shoved a pacifier in her mouth, strapping it in place.
"You're not a baby that's old enough to talk yet." Yukari said, sadistically smiling as she stripped Yuuka of all her torn clothes. "A shame that such big breasts went to an overgrown baby.." The gap-hag muttered, groping Yuuka's supple breast, earning a response of furious screaming and moaning muffled by the pacifier.
Yukari then managed to get Yuuka's legs spread and get her private area powdered and oiled. She lifted the furious woman's legs into the air and slid a very thick diaper with sunflower prints on it under her bottom, lifting it between her legs and taping it between her legs. She finished the look by tying a small sunflower bib around her neck, putting her hair in pigtails, and replacing her restraints with mittens and booties, and putting a bell collar around her neck.
"Now you look the part, an adorable overgrown infant." Yukari teased, picking the steaming Yuuka up and sitting with her on her lap on the rocking chair, her diaper lowered and a paddle in yukari's hand, provided by Ran who was watching them.
" You won't learn from just humiliation, you'll need constant physical reminders delivered to your cute little ass, or in your diaper." Yukari smiled sadistically as she spoke, seeming to enjoy this abit to much as Yuuka cringed on her lap every time she pretended she was going to slam the paddle down on her bottom, sometimes carrying through with the act. Finally Yukari began the spankings, bringing down the paddle hard enough for even Yuuka to let out a cry of pain and leap forward. This continued for well over half an hour, until the strong Yuuka Kazami found herself crying and being bounced on Yukari's knee.
"It's time for feeding, then the little girls naptime~" Yukari said excitedly, removing her large breast and holding Yuuka up to them, her pacifier removed. "Keep in mind that if you bite then we'll repeat what just happened." She said, giving a slap on her red thigh for emphasis. This made Yuuka yelp, giving Yukari an opportunity to force her nipple into Yuuka's mouth and make her suckle, since she never would willingly. Yuuka didn't want to, but Yukari held her to her breast until she was finished to make her, only to then switch her to the other and repeat.
"There we go, now your acting better." Yukari said to the flustered Yuuka as she put the pacifier in her mouth once again, little resistance coming from Yuuka this time.
Yukari layed Yuuka down in the crib, attaching her collar to a leash that she tied to one of the legs to make sure she couldn't get out. "Sleep well, this was only the beginning.." Yukari said, leaving Yuuka in the crib terrified as she turned off the Nursery light and left.

"So, what will you do with her, Yukari-shama?" Chen asked, rushing up and hugging her.

"well chen, she will.."

1551.title: Alice Margatroid

15511.content:
It was a peaceful day in the forest magic, the sun was shining through the leaves for once and the troublesome witch wasn't running around blowing holes in trees. Alice Margatroid was taking this chance to sew one of her most prized dolls, a little plush of the black-and-white mage, when suddenly a knock on the door made her jump. "I almost dorgot what that sounds like.." She muttered, stowing away her prized possession in her desk before going to answer it. " It can't be Marisa, she never knocks.." Alice muttered to herself, unlocking and opening the door to see a silver-haired beauty there. "M...Mommy, w-" Before Alice could finish her question she was pulled into a big embrace, her face burried in her mother's supple breast.

"Mommy has missed her baby girl sooo much, she just had to come visit!" Shinki explained, smiling as her daughter wrapped her arms around her waist losely, patting her head.

"You're so cute Alice, maybe even cuter than when you left!" Shinki kept pouring on the praise, now sitting in the living room with a flustered Alice on her lap.
"Speaking of which, did little Arisu ever get over her accidents?" She asked curiously, lifting up her daughter's skirt and turning red as she saw the rather mature panties she was wearing.

"M-mommy!" Alice cried out in embarrassment, pulling down her skirt and getting off her lap, pouting at her." O-of course I'm fully potty trained now, I'm 32!" Alice cringed up as she saw her mother's face, clearly distraught.

"A..Alice told me she would never grow up though.." Shinki said sadly, guilt clearly showing on both of their faces now.
"Well, that's ok, Alice had to grow up to survive, so now mommy will turn her back into mommy's little girl!" As she spoke Shinki pulled her adult daughter over her knee, holding her hands behind her back to keep her there. " Now then, as long as mommy's around, big girl things like these-" Shinki lifted up her struggling daughter's skirt, taking off the puppeteer's panties and tossing them in a trash can"-are not allowed, and mommy has to punish naughty girls who do such things."

Alice gulped, realizing what this meant as her mother raised her hand in the air. It didn't help matters that she knew her foolish mother was serious, or that she had a full bladder.
"Now show mommy you can at least count like a big girl." She said, bringing her hand down on alice's soft rear hard, making her jump and begin sobbing.
"O-one!"
This continued for about five more minutes before Shinki noticed a dampness running between her crying daughter's legs.
" Oh my, looks like Alice really did lie to mommy about her accidents." Shinki said strictly, pulling a pacifier out of her breast pocket and forcing it into Alice's mouth in an attempt to ccalm the crying woman as she layed her on her table, getting a bag.

"P-pwease stop mommy... A-awice an aduwt!" The blonde girl pleaded as her mother went to work cleaning then preparing her diaper area, eventually getting the puppeteer into a very large pink diaper, smiling at the oversized baby and patting her between the legs as she finished.

"There we go, good thing mommy came prepared for her naughty baby~" She teased, picking up an unresponsive Alice and bouncing her in her arms as she wondered around the house.
"Were's alice's bedroom.." She wondered out loud, walking into a room that ended up being a nursery despite Alice's protesting.
The nursery was a complete nursery, with pink walls with patterns of baby toys and bottles all over it, as well as a changing table, crib, and all the other fixings.

"Care to explain, ms.adult?" Shinki asked sternly, smiling as she placed Alice in the crib.
"P...Patchouli told me she could m-make me and Marisa a baby with magic..." Alice tried to explain, her mother clearly not believing it as she went through the cupboards, eventually finding a bib that said 'cutey on it and tying it around her neck.

"You look so adorable!" Shinki cooed, setting up a baby monitor. "Good girls don't tell lies Alice, and good girls don't get spankings. You're much to young to even have a girlfriend, silly baby!" Shinki ruffled her flustered daughter's hair, turning off the lights and making her lay down.
"Have a good nap, mommy loves you, ok?"
All Alice could do was nod meekly in response, hugging shanghai and closing her eyes by the time the door shut.

When she came to, Alice was greeted by-

"M-mommy!?" Alice yelped. Shinki 'shh'd her, putting her hand on her head and pushing her nipple into her open mouth. Shinki held her there, despite Alice's muffled protesting, until she began suckling.

You were clearly at least 100 years to early to even go to school."Shinki lectured as she held her daughter to her breast, only letting her stop when she couldn't drink any more. She then layed Alice's head over her shoulder, patting her back until she let out a loud belch.

"What did you call me here for, ojou-sama?" Rin asked, tilting her head curiosly.

"You're not a housetrained cat, are you?" Satori asked, interrupting Rin as she opened her mouth.
"You aren't?" Rin nodded a little.
"I'm fine using the bathroom though!" Rin cried out as Satori got up, pulling a package out from under her chair.

"I must compromise if the cat's not housetrained. Lay down." Rin turned pink, laying on her back and having her lacy black panties revealed, then removed.

"It's not embarassing, a cat shouldn't be wearing clothes to begin with." Satori calmly explained, powdering and oiling her pet. Finally, she pulled a thick white diaper out from the pack and taped it around her pet's waist.

"O-ojou-sama, I'm not a kitten." Rin complained, getting up and pulling her dress over her padded rear.

"You are now." Satori said, returning to her seat and patting her lap.

"Would you like to sit on my lap and get petted?"

1553311.content:
Rin stood there a moment, contemplating the question, before nodding meekly and waddling over to her mistress, getting pulled onto her lap.

"Such a good kitten." Satori said, smiling as Rin purred, petting her head.

"Matter of fact.. I think collecting corpses is a little to dangerous for my little kitten." Rin perked up, gulping a little. Satori ignored her pet's reaction, petting her a bit more aggressively to make her pur louder and press against her.

"Until I can come up with a better job for the kitten, she'll have to stay with me... don't worry, ojou-sama can take care of you." Satori grinned at the bright red youkai on her lip, moaning as her aggressive petting turned into groping.

"Such a naughty kitten though, you're not old enough to have these. Oh my, your even enjoying this.." Satori grinned, stopping and placing the panting, 'excited' cat on the ground. She tugged on her collar, fastening a leash onto it and standing up, beginning to make her way down a corridor. Rin tried to walk behind her initially, only to recieve a hard tug on the leash as soon as she stood up, being forced back on all fours.

"Kittens don't walk, they crawl." Satori explained, smiling and watching as Rin crawled to her. As she crawled her skirtnwas raised up, making her diaper, which was crinkling loudly, exposed.

"Oh my, the little kitty is worried about people finding out how much of a kitty she is?" Satori asked, squatting down and putting a pacifier in Rin's mouth.

Satori pulled on her leash, making Rin pick up her pace. She noticed that she was still a bit skittish, turning red and slowing down whenever just a dead fairy passed by.

Rin gulping, looking around nervously at the room. She began to open her mouth as she recieved a slap to the bottom again.

155331121.content:
The kasha looked down at her rapidly expanding diaper, face still redder than a tomato. Try as she might, she couldn't hold back a shameful purr. Even though this was extremely humiliating(imagine what Okuu would say if she saw her like this!), the warmth around her padded crotch felt good. And besides, she had been holding this in for a while.

Her mistress chuckled, petting her cute little pet. "See? Isn't it much better like this? You don't need to worry about making it to the potty- don't think I don't know about that accident you had on that one trip to the graveyard." The two-tailed girl somehow blushed even brighter. It was that damned jiang-shi's fault! If she didn't want to be wheeled away, she should act less like a corpse.

Rin let out a small yelp as Satori swatted her bottom. "Now, don't push the blame onto others. Who was the one who decided to drink two mugs of coffee before the trip, even as her mistress suggested against it?" The satori said. The kasha's ears drooped as she replied. "Me..."

"Who was the one who knew that the distance between our home and the graveyard was large, and didn't go to the bathroom beforehand?" She asked again. "B-But, I thought-...M-me..." Rin changed her answer as her mistress gave her a look. "And finally, who was the one that carted off the corpse, without noticing that there was a seal on it's head, wore nearly pristine clothes, and was still twitching." Satori finished.

The kasha let out a soft whine before replying in a quiet voice "...Me..." Satori nodded. "So, in the end, whose fault was it?"She asked. "...It was my fault, S-Satori-sama..." The girl admitted sadly, her tails between her legs as she got chewed out by her mistress.

"Mmm, good kitty. You should always be honest, even if you're not with a mind-reader like myself. Now, why don't we get you out of that icky diaper in into a fresh one?" Satori said, scratching behind her pet's ears as she carried her Rin to the changing table. Laying her down, she started changing the kitty. Throwing the wet diaper into a nearby trashcan, she dug through the drawers in search of a clean diaper.

"I told them to-ugh...Rin, don't go anywhere. I'm going to go get some diapers." Satori said as she left the room, not noticing that she dropped a card on the floor. The kasha looked as the card quizzically, ears swiveling. This was her chance to run! But...Satori-sama could have read her mind and set up a trap, or she might have not. She decided to try and escape anyway.

What was the card that Satori dropped?

"Well, come along. Crawl, don't walk." Eirin commanded, walking down the corridor. Reisen crawled behind her, blushing bright red, her wet blue-and-white panties sticking out under her short skirt. Eirin led her into a room that looked like a human's nursery, with Tewi sitting in the middle smiling triumphantly.

"W..why is she here..?" Reisen asked with a gulp, being lead over to her.

"She thought something may happen, and she will administer udongei's first punishment." Eirin explained, tugging udongei onto Tewi's lap.

"Look's like I'm the mature one~" Tewi teased, fully removing Udongei's panties.

"O..okay, I can understand a punishment, but why her!?" Reisen cried out, not daring to attempt getting away.

"Well, it's more amusing this way, and I'm sure you've grown used to me punishing you." Eirin explained cheerfully, smiling sadistically as she gave Tewi the signal to begin.

Seven minutes later, Reisen was laying on the changing table, sobbing with her bottom bright red. Her hands and feet were restrained in mittens and booties in different corners of the table, and a carrot pacifier was strapped into her mouth.

"Now for the second stage. I'll have to raise you as a baby again.. or maybe I'lljust keep you as one for kaguya's first bride.." Eirin grinned, powdering and oiling udongei's diaper area.
1553322111.title: Eirin

info.brief_description: Make sure these lolis are padded.
info.description:
Welcome, let's get to the stories.
Also, I know this isn't normally up front and stuff, but if anybody wants to rp Touhou, as long as you're a dom I'd love to. Just message me and we can discuss it~

-No vore
-No gore
-No inflating, weight gain or loss, or changing of height(unless it's suika)
-No character death
-No ending
-Keep it diaper/infalitism
-No crossovers from other series, keep it touhou project. Cameos are fine.
-Make them wet and mess
-Post should be at least a paragraph long.
-Have fun!
